name: Legendary Six Samurai - Enishi
effectText: Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can banish 2 "Six Samurai" monsters from your GY, then target 1 face-up monster on the field; return that target to the hand. You must control a "Six Samurai" monster with a different name to activate and to resolve this effect. While you control 2 or more "Six Samurai" monsters, except "Legendary Six Samurai - Enishi", this card gains 500 ATK/DEF.
